FuncDef: The reset rip imported-routes command deletes the routes imported from other RIP processes or protocols and re-imports the routes to RIP. The reset rip imported-routes command deletes the routes imported from other RIP processes or protocols and re-imports the routes to RIP.

ParaDef.Info:
Indicates the ID of a RIP process.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4294967295.
